intro: Cleistanthus borneensis, commonly known as the Bornean cleistanthus, is a flowering plant native to the rainforests of Borneo. It belongs to the family Euphorbiaceae and is characterized by its simple, alternate leaves and showy yellow flowers. The plant typically grows as a shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 5 meters. Its fruits are capsule-like structures that contain several seeds, and it plays a role in the ecological dynamics of its native habitat. Due to habitat loss, it is considered a vulnerable species in some regions.
